Class ClientRecords

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Client>

    public class ClientRecords
extends java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,Client>
    ClientRecords stores Clients in a Map
    See Also:
